abstracts.abstract: Nominates Beverly A. Potts as a Member of the Capital Development Board.

actions.description: ** Appointment Message Carried Over from Previous General Assembly **
Received by the Senate Sen. Laura M. Murphy;  on 02/14/2024
Assigned to Executive Appointments;  on 02/14/2024 - and on 01/07/2025, Due to Sine Die of the 103rd General Assembly
Placed on Calendar Order of Executive Appointments February 25, 2025
Pursuant to Senate Rule 10-1(c), move to compile the following AM's

Motion Filed Appointment Messages Be Acted on Together ** Sen. Laura M. Murphy;  AM 1030399(Amusement Ride and Attraction safety Board)
AM’s 1030406,1030407(Illinois Forensic Science Commission)
AM’s 1030408,1030419,1030436(Health Benefits Exchange Advisory Committee)
AM 1030411(Illinois Housing Development Authority)
AM 1030412(Illinois State Medical Board)
AM’s 1030413, 1030415,1030421,1030426(Illinois State Museum Board)
AM 1030424(Blue Ribbon Commission on Transportation Infrastructure Funding and Policy)
AM 1030416(Illinois Student Assistance Commission)
AM1030425(Southwestern Illinois Development Authority)
AM 1030427(Commission on Discrimination and Hate Crimes)
AM’s 1030428,1030432,1030437 (Capital Development Board)
AM 1030430(State Board of Health)
AM 1030433(Energy Workforce Advisory Council)
AM 1030434(Criminal Justice Information Authority)
